sections.title: Antique
sections.description: Our Antique Collection is a tribute to Elegant design. Elegant retro touches meet modern technology in freestanding cookers built for both charm and performance.

sections.title: Perfection
sections.description: Perfection Collection brings a sleek, contemporary look to your kitchen. Inspired by professional kitchens, it blends advanced functionality with minimalist elegance.

sections.title: Mixture
sections.description: Rounded edges and soft lines define the Mixture Collection. Where functional innovation meets harmonious design — perfect for the modern lifestyle.

sections.title: Elegant
sections.description: The Elegant Collection delivers timeless beauty and reliable cooking power. A balance of cast-iron tradition and contemporary control in one refined appliance.

company.title: BULM Italy SRL
description: BULM Italy SRL is a distinguished Italian company specializing in the design and production of high-end home appliances. Founded in 1979 in Milan, the brand has become a symbol of craftsmanship, innovation, and timeless elegance.

What began as a small manufacturing workshop driven by passion and precision, evolved into an international benchmark for quality. For over four decades, BULM has been redefining the modern cooking experience through cutting-edge technology, refined aesthetics, and unmatched performance.

Every BULM product is born from a deep understanding of Italian design — attention to detail, Perfection in materials, and a commitment to functionality. Today, the brand continues to create intelligent kitchen solutions that blend tradition with innovation.

seo.title: BULM Timeline – The Spirit of Italian Achievement
seo.description: Discover the inspiring history of BULM – from a small idea in 1979 to a global name in premium kitchen appliances.
seo.keywords: BULM timeline, company history, Italian appliances, kitchen innovation, cooking evolution
seo.og_title: BULM Timeline – The Spirit of Italian Achievement
seo.og_description: Explore how BULM redefined kitchens over decades through design, innovation, and Italian craftsmanship.

entries.title: The Beginning
entries.content: In 1979, BULM began its journey as a small initiative with a bold vision — to redefine the cooking experience. Born from a passion for craftsmanship and quality, the brand started producing durable, elegant cooking appliances for everyday use.

entries.title: Early Expansion
entries.content: With growing demand for refined appliances, BULM expanded its production lines to include integrated kitchen solutions. Every product reflected a dedication to precision and design Perfection.

entries.title: Innovation Driven
entries.content: In the 1990s, the company focused on innovation — combining smart features with stylish aesthetics. This period marked BULM’s rise as a leading name in high-end European kitchen appliances.

entries.title: Global Reach
entries.content: BULM entered international markets, offering its signature Italian flair to kitchens around the world. The brand became synonymous with reliability, performance, and timeless design.

entries.title: Future Forward
entries.content: Today, BULM continues to innovate by integrating smart technologies and sustainable materials — empowering modern lifestyles and shaping the future of kitchen living.

collections.title: Unique Collections.
collections.subtitle: Distinctive lines
collections.description: Your skill for cooking deserves the right tools. At BULM, we understand that great cooking means adapting to different preferences shaped by diverse traditions and lifestyles. That’s why we offer an extensive range of kitchen appliances designed to match every need. Discover the collection that best fits your kitchen with BULM.

sections.title: Collections Cookers
sections.description: BULM freestanding cookers bring together modern innovation and elegant style. Explore our four signature lines — Antique, Perfection, Mixture, and Elegant — each created to suit various lifestyles and tastes, while ensuring top-tier performance and design.

sections.title: Collections Hobs
sections.description: Whether you prefer traditional gas, gas-on-glass, or advanced induction technology, BULM hobs are built with premium materials and versatile configurations. Every model delivers high performance and essential safety features — including a booster function for quicker cooking and energy-saving capabilities in induction models.

sections.title: Collections Ovens
sections.description: From meat to pizza, bread to pastries, BULM ovens are designed to handle all culinary tasks. With precision and ease-of-use at the forefront, there's a BULM oven for every home chef ready to turn passion into perfect results.

neroLinePage.title: BULM Nero Line – Where Precision Meets Style
neroLinePage.description: Experience the harmony of Italian innovation and refined design with the BULM Nero Line. This elite range of built-in kitchen appliances is crafted for those who value cutting-edge functionality wrapped in timeless elegance.

meta.title: Nero Line Collection | BULM
meta.description: Explore BULM’s Nero Line: premium built-in ovens, microwaves, coffee machines, and warming drawers. Italian craftsmanship meets modern technology in your kitchen.
meta.keywords: BULM Nero Line, built-in kitchen appliances, Italian design, multifunction oven, microwave oven, warming drawer, automatic coffee machine
meta.ogDescription: Step into the world of BULM’s Nero Line — a selection of sophisticated built-in appliances blending technology with Italian elegance.
meta.twitterDescription: The BULM Nero Line offers a premium range of built-in kitchen appliances designed with Italian flair and innovation.

neroLinePage.mainImageAlt: Hero Image of BULM Nero Line

sections.title: Built-in Multifunction Electric Oven
sections.description: Designed for high-level culinary performance, this oven features 11 modes including Air Fry, Pizza at 300°C, Easy Steam, and Booster for rapid heating — transforming everyday cooking into a professional experience.

sections.title: 45cm Combi Microwave Oven
sections.description: Roast, grill, bake and reheat with ease. This versatile appliance includes 13 functions and preset programs for daily meals — from soups to pizza — with design that complements any modern kitchen.

sections.title: Automatic Coffee & Cappuccino Maker
sections.description: Brew café-quality drinks at home. This sleek machine delivers authentic espresso and creamy cappuccinos at the touch of a button — blending Italian heritage with modern ease.

sections.title: Warming Drawer
sections.description: A refined addition for every kitchen, ideal for keeping meals warm or warming plates before serving. Designed to seamlessly integrate with the BULM Nero Line look.

layout.title: Cookers Collections
layout.subtitle: Tailored to Every Culinary Taste
layout.description: BULM freestanding cookers unite refined Italian craftsmanship with powerful performance. Whether your kitchen style leans Elegant or contemporary, our cookers are built to deliver Perfection with lasting appeal.

antique.title: Antique
antique.description: Inspired by timeless elegance, the Antique Collection blends Antique design with modern functionality. A perfect choice for those who appreciate nostalgic charm without compromising on performance.

perfection.title: Perfection
perfection.description: With its sleek lines and professional-grade features, the Perfection Collection brings a contemporary, chef-inspired feel to your kitchen — minimal yet highly functional.

mixture.title: Mixture
mixture.description: Soft contours and curved shapes define the Mixture Collection. It’s where thoughtful innovation meets elegant simplicity, crafted for today's home kitchens.

elegant.title: Elegant
elegant.description: The Elegant Collection combines enduring aesthetics with dependable cooking power. It merges cast-iron heritage and advanced controls into one sophisticated appliance.

meta.title: BULM Cooker Collections | Antique, Elegant, and More
meta.description: Dive into BULM’s lineup of freestanding cookers — Antique, Elegant, Perfection, and Mixture — where Italian style meets innovative cooking solutions.
meta.keywords: BULM cookers, Italian freestanding cookers, Antique-style cookers, modern kitchen appliances, professional gas cookers, Elegant cooker series
meta.ogTitle: BULM Cooker Collections | Antique, Elegant, and More
meta.ogDescription: Browse BULM’s Italian-crafted cookers, designed for all kitchen styles — from Elegant allure to modern finesse. Find your perfect match.
meta.twitterTitle: BULM Cooker Collections | Antique, Elegant, and More
meta.twitterDescription: Explore BULM cookers: Antique, Mixture, Elegant, and Perfection — blending Italian design with forward-thinking cooking innovation.

layout.title: Premium Materials Meet
layout.subtitle: Next-Level Cooking Performance
layout.description: BULM hobs are designed with superior craftsmanship and the latest in Italian kitchen innovation. Choose from a wide range of formats — gas, induction, glass, or vitroceramic — all made to seamlessly complement BULM ovens and elevate every cooking moment.

enzo.title: Enzo Hobs
enzo.description:
Experience maximum flexibility with the Enzo Collection, offered in three widths: 60cm, 75cm, and 90cm.

Pick your style: gas on glass-ceramic with electronic controls, traditional full-gas models, modern induction, or sleek vitroceramic cooktops.

land.title: Land Hobs
land.description: Rustic charm meets innovation in the Land Collection. With textured finishes and natural tones, these hobs bring countryside elegance into your kitchen — without compromising on advanced performance.

meta.title: BULM Hob Collections | Gas, Induction & Vitroceramic Cooktops
meta.description: Explore BULM’s top-tier hobs in gas, induction, and vitroceramic models. Italian-designed for high performance, reliability, and kitchen harmony.
meta.keywords: BULM hobs, gas cooktops, induction cooktops, vitroceramic hobs, glass-top stoves, Italian kitchen design, modern hobs
meta.ogTitle: BULM Hob Collections | Gas, Induction & Vitroceramic Cooktops
meta.ogDescription: Discover BULM’s finely crafted hobs — available in gas, induction, and vitroceramic — built to blend function and Italian flair.
meta.twitterTitle: BULM Hob Collections | Gas, Induction & Vitroceramic Cooktops
meta.twitterDescription: Modern, reliable, and elegant — BULM hobs are designed in Italy for top culinary results and stylish kitchen integration.

layout.title: Built-in
layout.subtitle: Where Italian craftsmanship meets modern innovation
layout.description: Experience the refined design of BULM built-in ovens — merging authentic Italian style with modern cooking advancements. Offered in 60cm and 90cm sizes, these ovens provide both gas and multifunction electric options, with intelligent features like Easy Steam, fan-assisted baking, and more.

enzo.title: Enzo
enzo.description: The Enzo Collection features sleek, minimal lines paired with a unique design identity. With innovations like Easy Steam and Idroclean, it ensures powerful performance and superb cooking results.

enzoTitan.title: Enzo Titan
enzoTitan.description: Whether gas or multifunction electric, every 90cm Enzo Titan built-in oven boasts a spacious 141-litre capacity — ideal for larger meals and multitasking without compromises.

land.title: Land
land.description: The Land Collection brings a warm and inviting countryside charm to your home. Its built-in ovens are designed to create a nostalgic atmosphere while delivering reliable performance.

expert.title: Expert
expert.description: Crafted with refined detail, the Expert Collection delivers professional-grade cooking power for passionate home chefs.

alterum.title: Alternate
alterum.description: The Alternate Collection showcases elegant, minimalist aesthetics with a distinct touch. Its understated design fits perfectly in both modern and Elegant kitchens.

meta.title: Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
meta.description: Explore BULM’s built-in ovens: the perfect mixture of Italian artistry and cutting-edge cooking features. Available in gas or electric, with Easy Steam, fan cooking, and more.
meta.keywords: BULM, Built-in Ovens, Italian Ovens, Gas Oven, Electric Oven, Easy Steam, 60cm Oven, 90cm Oven, Modern Kitchen Appliances
meta.ogDescription: Explore BULM’s built-in ovens: premium craftsmanship, innovative performance, and timeless Italian design.

enzoHobs.title: Enzo Hobs Collection
enzoHobs.description: The Enzo hobs line is crafted using premium materials to ensure exceptional durability and performance. Each model includes advanced safety features and optimal cooking results. Options include gas on metal, gas on glass, and induction hobs, available in various sizes and styles — from compact to traditional.

gasMetal.title: Gas on metal hobs
gasMetal.description: A refined look defined by sleek edges and minimalist shapes. Enzo’s gas-on-metal hobs are manufactured with enhanced material thickness (8/10) to ensure long-lasting strength. Sizes available: 60cm, 75cm, and 90cm.

gasGlass.title: Gas on glass hobs
gasGlass.description: Combining modern design with functionality, Enzo gas-on-glass hobs feature a black vitroceramic finish, matte black burners, and precision metal knobs. Sizes available: 60cm, 75cm, and 90cm.

gasMatik.title: Gas-matik hob
gasMatik.description: The Gas-matik hob offers intelligent functions like automatic shutdown after a set time, a minute minder, child safety lock, and auto shut-off after 4 hours. Available in 90cm size.

vitro.title: Vitroceramic Enzo hobs
vitro.description: Enzo vitroceramic hobs are easy to clean and highly resistant to scratches. Heat is transferred directly upward for efficient cooking. Sizes available: 30cm, 60cm, 78cm, and 90cm.

induction.title: Induction Enzo hobs
induction.description: Sleek and efficient, Enzo induction hobs are simple to install and include cooking technologies such as Chef Cook, Full Bridge, and Melting mode. Available in 30cm, 60cm, 70cm, 75cm, 80cm, and 90cm.

meta.title: BULM Enzo Hobs Collection | Gas, Glass, Vitroceramic & Induction
meta.description: Browse the BULM Enzo hob range — featuring gas, gas-on-glass, induction, and vitroceramic models built for performance, safety, and contemporary Italian flair.
meta.keywords: Enzo hobs, gas hobs, induction hobs, gas on glass hob, vitroceramic hob, BULM Enzo collection, kitchen appliances, built-in hobs
meta.ogTitle: BULM Enzo Hobs Collection | Gas, Glass, Vitroceramic & Induction
meta.ogDescription: Stylish, reliable, and versatile — BULM’s Enzo hobs come in various formats to suit any modern kitchen.

landHobs.title: Land Hobs. Rustic charm, modern performance
landHobs.description: For those who enjoy a country-inspired kitchen look and appreciate warm tones and earthy materials, Land Hobs offer a Elegant rustic vibe blended with BULM’s trusted technology and functionality.

1.title: Land design
1.description: The Land design is defined by its unique brass-finish knobs, paired with Antique-style golden markings — a blend of retro elegance and modern practicality.

meta.title: BULM Land Hobs Collection | Rustic Charm with Italian Innovation
meta.description: Discover the Land Collection from BULM: hob designs that bring warmth and Elegant countryside aesthetics into your home, with aged brass knobs and charming retro touches.
meta.keywords: Land hobs, rustic kitchen hobs, BULM Land collection, antique brass knobs, Elegant gas hobs, country-style kitchen appliances
meta.ogTitle: BULM Land Hobs Collection | Rustic Charm with Italian Innovation
meta.ogDescription: Inspired by the countryside, BULM’s Land Collection delivers rustic elegance and dependable cooking performance.

antique.title: Timeless elegance, crafted to perfection
antique.paragraph:
The Antique series adds distinctive personality to any kitchen space, blending graceful contours, a range of colors, and a uniquely retro essence.
Available in single, double, or triple oven formats, BULM Antique cookers combine gas hobs with electric or fan-assisted ovens for flexible performance.

1.title: Elegant retro finishes
1.description: Softly curved stainless steel back panels and smooth oven fronts are paired with brushed metal knobs and matching rails to complete the retro-inspired look.

2.title: Expansive hob with sturdy cast iron grates
2.description: Five-burner stainless steel cooking top. Equipped with robust cast iron supports, including one tailored for wok cooking.

3.title: Retro-inspired knobs
3.description: Paying homage to the original wood-fired stoves from the 1950s, the Antique collection features control knobs finished in sleek stainless steel.

4.title: Refined craftsmanship
4.description: The retro identity extends to practical touches like a digital cooking timer. Each model also features a polished chrome handle, a modern reinterpretation of the original Elba stove rail, lending an authentic feel to your kitchen.

1.title: Antique freestanding cooker with triple oven and dual fuel

2.title: Antique freestanding cooker with single gas oven

3.title: Antique freestanding cooker with double oven and dual fuel

meta.title: BULM Antique Cookers | Retro-Inspired Freestanding Ranges
meta.description: Explore the BULM Antique line — a collection of Elegant-style cookers that blend Italian charm with functional innovation. Dual fuel and gas options available.
meta.keywords: Antique kitchen appliances, BULM Antique collection, retro cookers, freestanding gas ovens, Italian dual fuel ranges
meta.ogDescription: Designed with attention to detail, BULM Antique cookers bring together nostalgic aesthetics and solid performance for the modern kitchen.
meta.twitterDescription: Blending 1950s charm with current-day features, BULM Antique cookers offer polished finishes, ergonomic design, and cooking versatility.

elegant.title: Elegant Collection. A style that never fades
elegant.paragraph: The Elegant Collection delivers a practical and reliable choice for everyday cooking. High-quality materials blend with Italian craftsmanship to create a clean and understated design. Single cavity cookers are available in two widths: 60cm and 90cm.

1.title: Nickel-finished knobs with inner ring
1.description: Featuring a nickel finish and inner bezel, these knobs offer both comfort and intuitive operation.

2.title: Durable enamelled pan supports
2.description: The enamel-coated steel supports create a seamless look and are designed for easy maintenance.

3.title: Minimalist metal handle
3.description: All cookers in the Elegant Collection are equipped with a brushed metal handle for a refined finish.

1.title: Elegant induction single cavity freestanding cooker

2.title: Elegant dual fuel single cavity freestanding cooker

3.title: Elegant electric single cavity freestanding cooker

meta.title: Elegant Cookers Collection | BULM Italy – Elegant & Everlasting
meta.description: Discover the Elegant Collection by BULM: refined freestanding cookers crafted in Italy. Available in electric, induction, or dual fuel options.
meta.keywords: Elegant cookers, Italian freestanding cookers, induction models, dual fuel appliances, electric cookers, long-lasting kitchen design, BULM Italy
meta.ogDescription: Experience Elegant Italian elegance with BULM’s freestanding cookers. Built for lasting style and dependable performance.
meta.twitterDescription: Step into timeless Italian design with BULM’s Elegant Collection. Choose from induction, electric, or dual fuel models made in Italy.

mixture.title: mixture Collection. Perfectly blended with your kitchen.
mixture.paragraph: Created to fit naturally into any kitchen layout, the mixture Collection delivers freestanding cookers that combine dual fuel hobs with either gas or electric ovens. Featuring minimalist lines, these appliances merge effortlessly into modern kitchen environments.

1.title: User-friendly digital control panel
1.description: Manage cooking time and oven functions easily with the built-in electronic controller that ensures both accuracy and adaptability.

2.title: Robust cast iron pot supports
2.description: Engineered for strength, the heavy cast iron supports provide a secure base for all types of cookware.

3.title: Unified metal handle design
3.description: Brushed metal handles are not only visually appealing but also offer a comfortable, ergonomic grip across the range.

4.title: Knobs with dual texture finish
4.description: Crafted in stainless steel and soft-touch matte black for both durability and a sleek appearance.

1.title: mixture single cavity dual fuel freestanding cooker

2.title: mixture single cavity dual fuel freestanding cooker

3.title: mixture single cavity dual fuel freestanding cooker

meta.title: BULM mixture Cookers | Elegant Dual Fuel Freestanding Solutions
meta.description: Explore the BULM mixture Collection – where contemporary design meets practicality. Dual fuel cookers built for integration and performance.
meta.keywords: BULM cookers, mixture collection, dual fuel cooking, freestanding kitchen appliances, Italian-designed ovens, modern cookers, gas-electric range, heavy duty pan support
meta.ogTitle: BULM mixture Cookers | Elegant Dual Fuel Freestanding Solutions

meta.twitterTitle: BULM mixture Cookers | Elegant Dual Fuel Freestanding Solutions
meta.twitterDescription: mixture Collection from BULM blends cutting-edge features with Italian aesthetics. A perfect fit for every modern home.

perfection.title: Perfection Collection — Elevated Performance, Inspired Design
perfection.description: Inspired by professional kitchens and built for efficiency, the Perfection Series by BULM sets a new standard in free-standing cookers.Available in both 60cm and 90cm models, you can choose between induction or gas cooktops, combined with multifunction electric ovens or dual fuel options.

sections.title: Advanced Digital Control
sections.description: Each unit features an intuitive touch interface, making it easy to precisely manage settings and cooking times — ideal for those who enjoy cooking with professional-level precision.

sections.title: Dual Ring Brass Burners
sections.description: Durable and high-performing, the brass burners ensure even heat distribution for all types of cooking.

sections.title: Professional-Grade Metal Knobs
sections.description: Brushed metal knobs with refined detailing provide both a sophisticated look and a tactile, professional feel.

sections.title: Elegant Handle Design
sections.description: Appliances in the collection feature handles with dual finishes: central brushed steel and polished chrome ends — a signature of BULM's design Perfection.

products.title: Dual fuel free-standing cooker with single cavity
Induction free-standing cooker with single cavity

seo.title: BULM Perfection Cookers | Premium Free-standing Appliances
seo.description: Explore the BULM Perfection Collection — high-end free-standing cookers with Italian design, advanced features, and multiple fuel configurations for every kitchen.
seo.keywords: BULM Cookers, Perfection Collection, Italian free-standing cookers, induction hobs, gas cookers, multifunction ovens, professional kitchen design, premium appliances
seo.ogTitle: BULM Perfection Cookers | Performance Meets Design
seo.ogDescription: With refined aesthetics and professional-grade features, BULM’s Perfection Collection redefines the modern free-standing cooker.
seo.twitterDescription: Discover BULM Perfection: premium cookers designed for top-tier performance and stylish, professional appeal.

alterum.title: Alternate Collection. Minimalism meets smart functionality
alterum.description: The Alternate Collection expresses a contemporary style with clean lines and distinctive details — a perfect balance between understated elegance and practical solutions for today’s kitchen.

sections.title: Easy Steam
sections.description: Thanks to steam generation inside the oven, Easy Steam helps preserve the natural moisture of food and ensures even heat distribution.

sections.title: Hydroclean
sections.description: An eco-friendly cleaning function that harnesses the power of steam: water is heated to 80–90°C to easily dissolve dirt and grease residues, without using chemical products.

seo.title: Alternate Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
seo.description: Explore the Alternate Collection of BULM built-in ovens — a blend of minimal style and advanced features like Easy Steam and Hydroclean for optimal kitchen performance.
seo.keywords: Alternate, BULM, built-in ovens, essential design, Easy Steam, Hydroclean, modern kitchen, premium appliances, kitchen technology
seo.ogDescription: Discover the ovens from BULM's Alternate line — clean design, advanced features, and maximum efficiency for a contemporary kitchen.

enzo.title: Enzo Collection. A refined balance of design and performance
enzo.description: The Enzo built-in range blends contemporary aesthetics with advanced engineering. Crafted from premium materials and equipped with state-of-the-art features like Easy Steam and Idroclean, this collection offers top-tier cooking results and effortless functionality. The streamlined design brings a unique elegance to any modern kitchen.

sections.title: Spacious oven interior
sections.description: With 74 litres of usable space (86 litres gross) and 7-position side racks, this oven is ideal for preparing multiple dishes simultaneously.

sections.title: Easy Steam
sections.description: The Easy Steam function creates steam inside the oven, adding the right amount of moisture to help preserve texture and enhance cooking results.

sections.title: Gas-Matik hob
sections.description: Enzo’s Gas-Matik hob offers intelligent features: each burner can be timed to turn off automatically or work as a minute minder. It also includes a child safety lock and shuts off automatically after 4 hours of continuous use. Available in a 90 cm version.

sections.title: Idroclean
sections.description: An eco-friendly cleaning feature using heated water (80–90°C) to generate steam that loosens dirt and grease without chemical cleaners.

seo.title: Enzo Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
seo.description: Explore BULM’s Enzo Collection – designed for modern kitchens with features like Easy Steam, Idroclean, and Gas-Matik. Perfect cooking meets modern style.
seo.keywords: Enzo ovens, BULM built-in ovens, multifunction oven, electric oven, Easy Steam, Idroclean, Gas-Matik hob, Italian appliances
seo.ogDescription: Bring elegance and innovation into your kitchen with Enzo built-in ovens by BULM. Discover modern features designed to enhance your cooking experience.

enzoTitan.title: Enzo Titan Collection. More space, more power, more performance
enzoTitan.description: Visualize an environment where space is never a constraint and performance is always at its peak — achieve exceptional results effortlessly in every situation.

sections.title: Extra-large electric multifunction ovens
sections.description: Explore our electric multifunction ovens. Available in your preferred finishes, every 90cm Titan oven boasts a 141-litre gross volume and 121-litre usable space. With 7 shelf levels, multiple cooking modes, fast preheating, and dual fan circulation, you get a comprehensive 3D cooking experience.

sections.title: Extra-large gas ovens
sections.description: Titan gas ovens stand out with a full-width gas grill and integrated fan system — a powerful pairing for precise temperature control and flexible cooking. Includes a full-width stainless steel rotisserie kit with double fork supports for even roasting.

seo.title: Enzo Titan Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
seo.description: Explore the Enzo Titan collection by BULM — 90cm built-in ovens with electric or gas technology, 141L capacity, twin fan airflow, rotisserie kit, and smart features for outstanding results.
seo.keywords: Enzo Titan ovens, BULM built-in ovens, 90cm ovens, electric ovens, gas ovens, multifunction ovens, rotisserie, Italian kitchen appliances
seo.ogTitle: Enzo Titan Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
seo.ogDescription: Push your kitchen to new limits with BULM’s Enzo Titan ovens — available in powerful gas or advanced electric formats, designed for generous capacity and high-level cooking.

meta.title: Expert Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
meta.description: Discover the Expert built-in ovens from BULM – cutting-edge appliances equipped with premium options like Easy Steam, Idroclean, 300°C Pizza Mode, and 40°C Dough Rising.
meta.keywords: Expert ovens, BULM ovens, multifunction built-in ovens, Easy Steam, Idroclean, Pizza 300°C, Dough Rising 40°C, spacious ovens, Italian appliances
meta.ogDescription: Explore BULM's Expert ovens – engineered for precision and consistent performance. Packed with smart features for the demands of modern kitchens.

expertOvens.title: Expert Collection. Engineered performance for your kitchen
expertOvens.description: The Expert collection brings advanced cooking efficiency into your home. With its refined design featuring stylish control knobs and ergonomic handles, it combines spaciousness, versatility, and enhanced usability. Exclusive functions like Easy Steam and Idroclean deliver smart convenience in every use.

easySteam.title: Easy Steam
easySteam.description: Easy Steam uses water evaporation inside the oven to gently enhance cooking results, delivering better textures and moisture retention compared to dry cooking methods.

idroclean.title: Idroclean
idroclean.description: Skip chemical cleaners – this eco-friendly feature loosens grease and grime using steam generated from water heated to 80–90°C, making cleanup fast and simple.

leavening.title: Leavening 40°C
leavening.description: These ovens offer a dedicated leavening mode at 40°C to maintain optimal conditions for dough proofing, preserving its structure and encouraging perfect rise for baking.

pizza.title: Special Pizza 300°C Mode
pizza.description: Achieve pizzeria-level results at home. This setting reaches 300°C and activates both the upper element and fan, while spreading bottom heat via forced convection – perfect for crispy, even pizza bakes.

largeCavity.title: Spacious Oven Interior
largeCavity.description: A large 74L usable space (86L gross) with 7 shelf positions and removable side racks – ideal for multitier cooking or handling larger dishes with ease.

meta.title: Land Built-in Ovens | BULM Italy
meta.description: Discover the Land line of built-in ovens by BULM — a blend of rustic aesthetics and modern technology. Multifunction electric ovens with Hydroclean feature and Elegant country-style details.
meta.keywords: Land ovens, BULM, built-in ovens, rustic style, kitchen appliances, Hydroclean, multifunction electric ovens, country chic
meta.ogDescription: The Land collection by BULM combines traditional charm and modern practicality with built-in ovens featuring a warm and refined design.

landOvens.title: Land Collection. Tradition that inspires
landOvens.description: Perfect for those who appreciate Country Chic style and the natural tones of materials, the built-in ovens from the Land collection bring a welcoming atmosphere to the kitchen inspired by countryside homes.

countryStyle.title: Distinctive country aesthetics
countryStyle.description: The rustic design stands out with antique brass knobs and golden screen-printed details evoking a Antique style — a perfect blend of Elegant charm and innovation.

idroclean.title: Hydroclean
idroclean.description: A cleaning function that uses steam generated from water heated to 80–90°C, allowing for the removal of dirt without the need for chemical detergents.

about.mainTitle: Since 1979, we’ve been shaping a legacy of innovation, reliability, and global reach.
about.mainDescription: Our extensive know-how and production agility in kitchen appliances have allowed us to establish a presence in over 60 countries worldwide.
about.section1Title: Italian Innovation in Design and Technology
about.section1Desc: Our entire manufacturing process takes place in Italy, blending precision engineering with the creativity and craftsmanship of local artisans. This is the hallmark of true Italian Perfection.
about.section2Desc: Operating from our centralized hub in Northeast Italy ensures consistency in quality, streamlined innovation, and full control over every production stage.
about.section3Title: Driven by Perfection and Strict Standards
about.section3Desc: At BULM, ‘Made in Italy’ is not just a label — it's a promise built on certified sourcing, high-grade components, and strict compliance with European quality regulations.
about.blackSectionDesc: What’s behind our global recognition? The Italian identity — admired worldwide — which we pour into each product. It’s not just about aesthetics; it’s about values, functionality, and passion in everything we create.
about.heartDesc: A kitchen is more than a place to cook — it’s where life happens. For over 40 years, BULM has helped bring warmth, creativity, and connection into homes through thoughtfully designed appliances tailored to your lifestyle.
about.lastDesc: Since our founding in 1979, we’ve upheld the highest standards in production. Every unit undergoes careful testing, inspection, and certification. We earned ISO 9001 in 1998 and continue to evolve with updates in ISO protocols — reinforcing our commitment to quality and reliability.
